##


```{r}
setwd("C:/E/brucebcampbell-git/bayesian-learning-with-R")
library(rjags)
N <- 2000
x <- rnorm(N, 0, 5)
 
write.table(x,
            file = 'example1.data',
            row.names = FALSE,
            col.names = FALSE)

jags <- jags.model('jags_normal_model.bug',
                   data = list('x' = x,
                               'N' = N),
                   n.chains = 10,
                   n.adapt = 100)
 
update(jags, 1000)
 
jags.samples(jags,
             c('mu', 'tau'),
             4000)

```


```{r}
library(coda)

samples <- coda.samples(jags,
                        c('mu', 'tau'),
                        1000)
plot(samples)
```
